title: DNS-SD API crashes DNS Client service on Windows 10
body: Simple usage of the DNS-SD API results in the DNS Client service crashing.

comments.body: Hey. How did you resolve to add text attributes? I am having the problem that I even don't know how to properly add text attributes. There is no documentation from Microsoft at all. API reference no examples. Thank you for help.
There were some murmurs about DNS-SD API not working with Hyper-V enabled. I turned it off and on again to no change in behavior.
